## ReconnectAttemptsExceededError class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Number of reconnect attempts exceeded. Reconects happen automatically when a WebRTC session is abruptly closed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ReconnectAttemptsExceededError extends Error 
```
**Extends:** Error
